description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss together kaleslaw, spaghetti, broccoli and tofu. Divide amongst serving bowls and top with peanut dressing. Garnish with toasted peanuts to serve.
